articles.author: Adam Wren
articles.title: Kirk’s death reinvigorates Republicans’ redistricting race - Politico
articles.description: In the wake of Charlie Kirk’s death, Republicans gathered at a summit in Indiana, where they memorialized the conservative activist and rallied the party to press forward with redistricting in the state.
articles.content: Between musical interludes featuring Jason Aldeans Fly over States and Try That In a Small Town, MAGA leaders spoke of demons at work behind the shooting of Kirk and the stabbing of Iryna Zarutska an… [+5829 chars]
